name: iris-tech-docs
description: Iris is a modular, extensible, real-time IoT backend. It receives data from devices and pipes it through a customizable process line. Write services that run analytics, store the data, send it somewhere else, etc. Or combine a buch of existing plugins to build the ultimate data flow. Iris gives you total freedom with the peace of mind of a stable, rock solid foundation.
author: Rita Zerrizuela <zeta@widcket.com> (http://widcket.com)
